title: Spells & Magic
description: How well do you know wizarding world magic?

questions.question: What spell disarms an opponent?
questions.explanation: Expelliarmus is the Disarming Charm and Harry's signature spell, forcing opponents to release what they're holding!

questions.question: Avada Kedavra is the killing curse.
questions.explanation: Avada Kedavra is one of the three Unforgivable Curses, causing instant death with no counter-curse!

questions.question: What spell creates light from a wand?
questions.explanation: Lumos creates light at the wand tip, while Nox extinguishes it. Lumos Maxima creates a brighter, detachable light!

questions.question: What are the three Unforgivable Curses?
questions.explanation: The Unforgivable Curses are Avada Kedavra (killing), Crucio (torture), and Imperio (mind control)!

questions.question: Expecto Patronum conjures a Patronus to fight Dementors.
questions.explanation: The Patronus Charm creates a silver guardian animal powered by happy memories to repel Dementors!

questions.question: What spell unlocks doors?
questions.explanation: Alohomora is the Unlocking Charm, one of the first spells Hermione uses in the series!

questions.question: What is Harry's Patronus?
questions.explanation: Harry's Patronus is a stag, just like his father James. Hermione's is an otter and Ron's is a Jack Russell terrier!

questions.question: Wingardium Leviosa makes objects float.
questions.explanation: Wingardium Leviosa is the Levitation Charm - remember, it's 'Levi-O-sa, not Levio-SA' as Hermione famously corrected Ron!
